Class FileCommunicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.harambe.communication.communicator.FileCommunicator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerCommunication

    public class FileCommunicator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerCommunication
    Class for communication via files with the server (read xml, write single digit .txt)
